unnormalised: Blueline Couriers faced major delays today, affecting deliveries across Mumbai and Delhi. Apparently, a truck carrying packages to 10 different pin codes including 400001 and 110001 broke down near Panvel at 7:30 AM.
normalised: Blueline Couriers faced major delays today, affecting deliveries across Mumbai and Delhi. Apparently, a truck carrying packages to ten different pin codes including four zero zero zero zero one and one one zero zero zero one broke down near Panvel at seven thirty A-M.

unnormalised: The incident caused a ripple effect, delaying shipments to numerous addresses on Linking Road (Mumbai) and Chandni Chowk (Delhi). Some customers residing at "A/1, Green Park, Delhi, 110016" are already complaining about missing their expected deliveries. A rep from Blueline at "Plot 5, Sector 44, Gurgaon, Haryana, 122003" said that they're working hard to get things back on track ASAP.
normalised: The incident caused a ripple effect, delaying shipments to numerous addresses on Linking Road (Mumbai) and Chandni Chowk (Delhi). Some customers residing at "A slash one, Green Park, Delhi, one one zero zero one six" are already complaining about missing their expected deliveries. A representative from Blueline at "Plot five, Sector forty four, Gurgaon, Haryana, one two two zero zero three" said that they're working hard to get things back on track A-S-A-P.

unnormalised: Consumers who were expecting parcels at "221B, Baker Street, Kolkata, 700001" and "10 Downing Street, Chennai, 600002" have been advised to track their packages via the Blueline website, or call the customer helpline based out of their regional office at "Level 2, Orion Mall, Bangalore, 560055". Expect delays of at least 24-48 hrs.
normalised: Consumers who were expecting parcels at "two two one B, Baker Street, Kolkata, seven zero zero zero zero one" and "ten Downing Street, Chennai, six zero zero zero zero two" have been advised to track their packages via the Blueline website, or call the customer helpline based out of their regional office at "Level two, Orion Mall, Bangalore, five six zero zero five five". Expect delays of at least twenty four to forty eight hours.
